Languages: Common; Dwarven; Goblin; Sakvroth
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Bargain Hunter: +2 initial gold/Can use Diplomacy to purchase items at a discount
Evangelize: Successful Diplomacy vs. Will inflicts stupefied 1 on target for 1 rd, or stupefied 2 for 1 rd on a critical success, once per target per day
Glad-Hand: Can make a -5 Diplomacy check to Make An Impression upon meeting and retry a failure after 1 min of conversation
Group Impression: Can use Diplomacy to Make An Impression on 20 targets
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half the normal time
Legendary Negotiation: (3) Can use Diplomacy with a -5 penalty to convince a foe to negotiate; requires a successful Make An Impression followed by a successful Request
No Cause For Alarm: Successful Diplomacy reduces frightened levels by 1 in a 10' emanation, or by 2 on a critical success
Shameless Request: Reduces the DC for an outrageous request by 2 and changes critical failures into normal failures
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Bard: 18 (charisma; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (+5 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Lance (+6 1d8+1 P [Crit +d8]; strength; trained); Spiked Gauntlet (+6 1d4+1 P; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Unconventional Weaponry (Trident): Weapon Familiarity (Trident)
Bon Mot: R30' Successful Diplomacy vs. Will inflicts -2 Perception and Will, or -3 on a critical success, for 1 min; critical failure inflicts the same on self for 1 min or until a successful Bon Mot
Martial Performance: Successful Strike while Courageous Anthem, Rallying Anthem, or Song Of Strength is active extends the spell by 1 rd
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +8 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 18 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Fear (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Warrior: Knows the Fear occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Directed Audience: Can redirect the emanation of a composition spell into a cone up to 10' longer and twice the area
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
Evangelize Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and diplomacy rank (currently 2) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 3 available vs. 9 allocated
Legendary Negotiation Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and diplomacy rank (currently 2) >= 4
Shameless Request Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and diplomacy rank (currently 2) >= 3
